thread.title: Meryl Streep Wore Elie Saab Instead of Chanel at 2017 Oscars - Meryl Streep Oscars Dress 2017
thread.title_full: Meryl Streep Wore Elie Saab Instead of Chanel at 2017 Oscars - Meryl Streep Oscars Dress 2017

author: Lauren Alexis Fisher
title: Meryl Streep Wore Elie Saab Instead of Chanel at 2017 Oscars - Meryl Streep Oscars Dress 2017

organizations.name: meryl streep wore elie saab instead of chanel

text:
Following what turned into a mini feud with Karl Lagerfeld this week, Meryl Streep showed up to the Oscars tonight wearing Elie Saab Couture. The actress opted for a navy, jewel-encrusted off-the-shoulder gown that had pants underneath:
Meryl Streep wore a custom #ElieSaab Spring 2017 Couture ensemble to the 2017 Academy Awards. #Oscars https://t.co/LfsYaVSznD pic.twitter.com/y3GlwNSJe1
â€” The Fashion Court (@TheFashionCourt) February 27, 2017
 Streep was reportedly planning to wear Chanel to the award show but Karl Lagerfeld accused the actress of backing out after finding a brand that would pay her to wear its clothes.
Lagerfeld told WWD earlier in the week, "After we gift her a dress that's worth $105,000, we found [out] later we had to pay [for her to wear it]. We give them dresses, we make the dresses, but we don't pay. A genius actress, but cheapness also, no?"
